definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
to start a new life/to make a fresh start
a re-examination/to have another look at sth

sentences.english: She tries to back track, but the President simply walks away.
sentences.chinese: 她试图重新回到话题，但总统一言不发地走开了。

sentences.english: B. Replan the project without the resources.
sentences.chinese: 跑去资源重新计划该项目。

sentences.english: How can I rebuild my trust in him?
sentences.chinese: 怎样才能重新建立起我对他的信任？

sentences.english: Experts said the study should prompt countries to reconsider how they classify drugs.
sentences.chinese: 专家称，这项研究应该促使各国重新考虑药品的分类。

sentences.english: Some of Pedini collections includes nice re-invent of inline kitchen layouts.
sentences.chinese: 一些佩蒂尼的产品包含了重新发明的内嵌厨具布局。
更换的系统模块又一次重新安装。

sentences.english: They also can be able to re-edit the post even after posting it.
sentences.chinese: 他们还可以能够重新编辑，即使它张贴的职位。

sentences.english: If issues remain, they are reallocated based on their type.
sentences.chinese: 如果仍然有问题，则会根据其类型进行重新分配。

sentences.english: This gives Carlisle a renewed impetus to nail Ripley, his love rival.
sentences.chinese: 这使卡莱尔重新追里普利，他的爱情对手。

sentences.english: He suggests establishing a trial period and a date for review.
sentences.chinese: 他建议设定一段试行期，并确定一个重新评估日期。

sentences.english: Second, adults should reappraise their priorities about what is important.
sentences.chinese: 其次，成年人应重新评估什么事情对他们最重要。

sentences.english: A file system must be unmounted to be reformatted.
sentences.chinese: 一个文件系统必须在被缷载后才可以重新格式化。

sentences.english: They decided that the entire game would have to be replayed.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定整个比赛要重新再赛一次。

sentences.english: In order to construct harmonious society, it is necessary to try to decrease the recidivism rate.
sentences.chinese: 建设和谐社会，尽量降低重新犯罪率是必要的。

sentences.english: That means programmers have to keep track or recompute how much space is left all the time.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着程序员必须始终跟踪或重新计算剩余的空间。

definition: again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
(once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
to pick up (a theme etc)/to regain (confidence)/to revive (a custom, friendship etc)
